layout_choice: Single-column layout for mobile responsiveness and ease of reading.
color_strategy: Utilized brand colors with a focus on vibrant summer tones representing Thailand.
typography_decisions: Chosen Arial for its readability and classic feel across email clients.
component_structure: Created custom components for promotional segments and clear CTAs for better user engagement.
responsive_approach: Focused on mobile-first design to cater to traveling audiences on the go.
accessibility_measures: Ensured compliance with WCAG AA standards for color contrast and alt text for images.
performance_optimizations: Optimized images and minimized code for quicker load times across various email clients.
client_compatibility: Tested design against major email clients for consistency and deliverability.
